briefTitle: HZA113091 Efficacy and Safety of Fluticasone Furoate/Vilanterol (GW642444) in Adults and Adolescents
officialTitle: A Randomised, Double-blind, Double-dummy, Parallel-group Multicentre Study to Assess Efficacy and Safety of Fluticasone Furoate/GW642444 Inhalation Powder and Fluticasone Propionate/Salmeterol Inhalation Powder in the Treatment of Persistent Asthma in Adults and Adolescents
summary: The purpose of the study is to compare the efficacy and safety of fluticasone furoate/vilanterol (GW642444) inhalation powder administered once daily with fluticasone propionate/salmeterol administered twice daily in adolescent and adult subjects 12 years of age and older with persistent bronchial asthma over a 24-week period.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Weighted-mean 24 Hour Serial FEV1 on Day 168/Week 24
